starters.name: Tomato basil soup
starters.description: Tomato Basil Soup is a weekly feature on our summer menu. Creamy, savory, and brimming with the rich flavor of freshly ripened tomatoes, we just can't get enough!

starters.name: Gnocchi
starters.description: Typical Italian dumplings made from potatoes and flour with tomato and garlic sauce.

starters.name: Spinach soup
starters.description: The lovely, leafy spinach in this recipe makes for a flavoursome and intriguing bright-green soup.

starters.name: Mixed salad
starters.description: A yummy, healthy salad loaded with nuts, cheese and greens, also called 'The Good Salad'.

starters.name: Courgette soup
starters.description: A satisfyingly delicious and smooth soup.

main.name: Chicken thighs
main.description: The chicken breast might get all the press, but it's the humble chicken thigh that really delivers in terms of flavor, versatility and economy.

main.name: Pappardelle
main.description: A brown butter sauce complements toasted walnuts, roasted butternut squash, and baby kale in a rich pasta dish that perfectly captures the flavors of fall.

main.name: Green curry soup
main.description: Known as kdat in Cambodia, taro stem, which grows out of the fibrous taro root like celery grows out of celery root, is a crisp, watery vegetable often used in soups to add brightness and crunch.

main.name: Puttanesca
main.description: Our take on this dish, famously named for the fact that Italy's ladies of the evening quickly made it between clients.

main.name: Mini burgers
main.description: Three tasty beef burgers with Couscous, vegetables and mozzarella cheese.

main.name: Special pasta
main.description: Amazingly tasty noodles that will make you feel in the seventh heaven.

dessert.name: Chocolate roulade
dessert.description: Milk chocolate coconut rolled crepe, coconut whip, buttered almonds, raspberry and chocolate sauces.

dessert.name: Dessert trio
dessert.description: Classic carrot cake with brown butter cream cheese frosting, lemon ginger bar, flourless chocolate torte with salted caramel and balsamic gastrique.

dessert.name: Lemon tart
dessert.description: Refreshing and tasty dessert made from locally sourced lemons, with lots of love.

dessert.name: Fruit salad
dessert.description: Really freshy and tasty salad made of different tropical and juicy fruits.

dessert.name: Jacques
dessert.description: French dessert perfect to eat during summer after a good fish dish.

dessert.name: Peanut ice cream
dessert.description: Really sweet American style peanut ice cream.

drinks.name: Beer
drinks.description: Light color, full, and very impressive taste.

drinks.name: Red wine
drinks.description: Full-bodied red wine made from a dark grape variety widely grown in its native Italy.

drinks.name: White wine
drinks.description: White Spanish wine grape variety that is grown in the Rioja Denominacion de Origen.
